name: jaipur-real-estate-portal
description: Complete Online Real Estate Portal for Jaipur, Rajasthan

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"

author: Jaipur Realty Team
